title: Freak Show
description: Alexa’s arrival in Sin City is greeted with a warning: leave town or be forced out.The return of her lover, Arys, has the Vegas vampires on edge. The Wicked Kiss Las Vegas location has changed in his absence. Werewolf death fights and vampire performance art takes it to a whole new level of crazy. The new club owner, Jenner, shares Arys’s bloodline and a few bad memories. Harboring a grudge, he intends to make Arys suffer for a past betrayal.However, there’s bigger trouble brewing in Sin City. A blood ring with a vendetta makes a deadly foe. It’s going to be a hell of a vacation.
author: Trina M. Lee
